name: Boulder Bash (itch)
description:
A game made by Anagh's World for Trijam #116: The 3 hour game jam

Plot

Huge boulders are falling down, the only way to survive is to stay behind a box and not move.

Theme - Stay there, don't move

The game follows the theme where the player needs to stay behind a box and not move to avoid getting hit by the boulders.

Overview

"Boulder Bash" is a partial top-down 2D game where the main goal of the game is to survive from getting hit by the boulders. Hide behind the box to survive and don't forget to avoid the traps and to collect the coins.

Controls

The controls are super simple.

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • LMB or Enter or Space to start
